Module it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera
Package it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.network.client

Class ViewModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.network.client.ViewModel
public class ViewModel extends Object
The ViewModel class represents the data model for managing game state and player information inside the client. It holds various maps and attributes to track game elements, player details, and game phases.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ViewModel()
    Constructs a new ViewModel instance initializing all necessary data structures.

    • addedCardToHand

      public void addedCardToHand(int playerIndex, int cardId)
      Adds a card to the hand of a specified player. If the player's hand does not exist yet, it initializes an empty hand.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player.
      cardId - The ID of the card to add to the hand.

    • removedCardFromHand

      public void removedCardFromHand(int playerIndex, int cardId)
      Removes a specified card from the hand of a player. Also removes any side association of the card.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player.
      cardId - The ID of the card to remove from the hand.

    • updatePlayerBoard

      public void updatePlayerBoard(int playerIndex, int placingCardId, int tableCardId, CornerPos existingCornerPos, Side side)
      Updates the player's board by placing a card at a specific position.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - The index of the player.
      placingCardId - The ID of the card being placed.
      tableCardId - The ID of the existing card on the table where 'placingCardId' is being placed.
      existingCornerPos - The position on the existing card where 'placingCardId' will be placed.
      side - The side of the card being placed.
